channel.title: WP76 R9 and usb serial ftdi
channel.description:
Hello all
The R9 WP76 firmware have usb serial ftdi driver added.
To enable it :
Plug a usb ftdi device Enter command : modprobe ftdi_sio
Look to /dev you will see ttyUSB0 If you want to have ftdi driver loaded at startup without any script you must rebuild the yocto Distro. Replace « M » by « * » to usb serial and ftdi usb serial .
This take a veryyyy long time
Francis

Hello all

The R9 WP76 firmware have usb serial ftdi driver added.

To enable it :

Enter command : modprobe ftdi_sio

Look to /dev you will see ttyUSB0
If you want to have ftdi driver loaded at startup without any script you must rebuild the yocto Distro. Replace « M » by « * » to usb serial and ftdi usb serial .

This take a veryyyy long time
